weeb.noanime: No anime found for query <query> in <source>
weeb.wiki_fail: Nothing was found for `<query>` in `<wiki>.fandom.com`. Please verify the inputs
weeb.sauce_no_image: No image posted on this channel

getanime.description: Command to get more info about an anime.
getanime.parameters:
**[(optional) source]** source of the info (MAL/Kitsu)
**[name]** anime name or search query

searchmal.description: Command to get a MAL link. Only first result is shown.
searchmal.parameters:
**[(optional) type]** type of info (anime/manga/person/character)
**[name]** name or search query

wiki.description: Gets the first article the search find for the given query in the wiki with the given slug.
wiki.parameters:
**[wiki slug]** slug of the wiki page (for example: swordartonline for <https://swordartonline.fandom.com>)
**[query]** search query
